name: TwitchChatHandler
shortDescription: A Simple Chat Handler Where u can See And Manage Your Chat Inside Game
description: Its Just a Project i made for fun to Let People See Their Chat and interact with it in game
-Sepatates Automatically Chat Commands from Normal Messages
-Custom Made Behaviors For Text Objects To Display Chat Messages

eventsFunctions.description: A Received Raw Message From Server
eventsFunctions.name: ServerRawMessage

parameters: SubStr(SubStr(WebSocketClient::Data(), StrFind(WebSocketClient::Data(), "#"), StrLength(WebSocketClient::Data())), StrFind(SubStr(WebSocketClient::Data(), StrFind(WebSocketClient::Data(), "#"), StrLength(WebSocketClient::Data())), ":")+1, StrLength(SubStr(WebSocketClient::Data(), StrFind(WebSocketClient::Data(), "#"), StrLength(WebSocketClient::Data()))))

eventsFunctions.description: A Received Message From Chat (Without Username)
eventsFunctions.name: OnlyChatMessage

parameters: SubStr(SubStr(WebSocketClient::Data(), StrFind(WebSocketClient::Data(), "#"), StrLength(WebSocketClient::Data())), StrFind(SubStr(WebSocketClient::Data(), StrFind(WebSocketClient::Data(), "#"), StrLength(WebSocketClient::Data())), ":")+1, StrLength(SubStr(WebSocketClient::Data(), StrFind(WebSocketClient::Data(), "#"), StrLength(WebSocketClient::Data()))))

eventsFunctions.description: A Received Command Message From Chat
eventsFunctions.name: CommandMessage

eventsFunctions.description: User Of Last Received Message From Chat
eventsFunctions.name: LastMessageUsername

eventsFunctions.description: Checks if Message Was A "!" Command
eventsFunctions.name: OnCommandReceived

eventsFunctions.description: Send A Chat Message To Server
eventsFunctions.name: SendChatMessage
